earth.name: Auroral Oval
earth.description: Realtime auroral oval tracing magnetospheric storms above northern latitudes.

moon.name: Shackleton Rim
moon.description: Crater rim near the lunar south pole with near-continuous illumination and nearby shadowed ice deposits.

mars.name: Perseverance
mars.description: Perseverance rover exploring Jezero crater delta to collect caches for Mars Sample Return.

mars.name: Olympus Mons
mars.description: The tallest planetary volcano with caldera scars revealing episodic eruptions.
